dict.string:
Disables/sets auto-lock duration to "Never". The screen will dim at 30 seconds but not auto-lock.
* Useful for those who always have "Low Power Mode" enabled but don't like the 30 sec auto lock restriction.
⚠️WARNING: Overrides auto-lock duration at all times!!! (i.e. NOT just while in low power mode & therefore the time duration at Settings>General>Auto-Lock is irrelevant.)
⚑ UPDATES: (2-16-16) *Initial release (8-3-16) *Changed title from "Low Power Mode - Disables Auto-Lock"
[v.1] Tested with an iP6+ 9.0.2. Made as a request via r/jailbreak. (8-3-16)
☞PayPal: goin730@gmail.com
Low Power Mode - Never Auto-Lock (only dim) ₈₋₃₋₁₆
